A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.CDK DESCRIPTION: Aston Martin Lead Sharing for One-Eighty (Canada)

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: AutoPilot data mining software allows dealers to pull service prospects from their customer database and create and send targeted email offers and is included in the Plus bundle.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts:
Slow service lane traffic
Low revenue per RO
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop: A personalized, automated service marketing solution to help improve one-to-one customer connections, create highly targeted campaigns, and increase retention.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: ELEAD AutoQuote is a feature within the CRM that automatically generates custom, multiple offers to the customer and sends via email. This is included in both Essentials and Plus bundles.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts: Slow response to internet leads
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Ensure peak deliverability with Salesforce-supported engine and Anti-SPAM testing.
 Limit staff involvement in managing lead response with easy-to-create
templates and workflow triggers.
Create personalized messaging and sending flexibility with mobile-friendly, automated or manual templates.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.CDK DESCRIPTION: Elead DealBuilder DocuSign Envelopes (Blocks of 100 Envelopes)

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: DealBuilder Showroom is a mobile application that enables the dealer to manage the customer showroom experience. The app features mobile CRM, inventory view and quote details to that can be captured and pushed to the CRM and to F&I. Also, fully integrated with Roadster solutions.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts: Poor customer experience transitioning from online to instore
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Build trust through transparency and accuracy in the car-buying experience, from the website to the store.
Track decision-making milestones by analyzing customer behavior data.
Integrate the online and showroom experience so customers never have to restart the sales process.
Sell vehicles with a seamless workflow and accurate customer data – all tied to the customer record in the
CRM.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: DealBuilder Showroom is a mobile application that enables the dealer to manage the customer showroom experience. CRM.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead Desking allow up to 9 offers to a customer, including lease, finance and cash offers.  This does not include 3rd party rates and incentives. If the dealer wishes to access MarketScan or AIS the can purchase separately.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts: Low front end gross
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Book out, appraise vehicles and easily calculate the best deal for maximum gross profit with streamlined quote creation.
Present easy-to-understand purchase options.
Build trust and a better customer experience.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Gold Digger is the equity mining tool within the CRM to find opportunities for the dealer within their customer base with a positive equity situation and is included in the Essentials and Plus bundles.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts:
Poor customer retention
Acquiring inventory
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop: Build lasting relationships, improve market share and increase profitability with a full-service multi-channel marketing approach that helps dealers connect with consumers in a smarter way.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Add on to the Elead CRM mobile app's driver's license scanner that enables the ability to authenticate consumers' IDs.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts:
Incorrect data entry
Rekeying information across tools
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Easy to use
Fully integrated with CRM and Modern Retail workflow

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead internet lead management is included in all CRM bundles and can be purchased as a the stand alone.  It enables dealers to track, deduplicate and follow up with internet email leads.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Dealer Hurts: struggle to acquire new customers
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Answer internet inquiries immediately, so customers stay engaged.
Allow your sales staff to focus on customers in the showroom, vs. on the phone or online.
Provide after-hours coverage to eliminate or reduce the cost of in-house BDCs.
Deliver emails as long as the lead is active in your CRM.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead internet lead management is included in all CRM bundles and can be purchased as a the stand alone.  It enables dealers to track, deduplicate and follow up with internet email leads.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead inventory management appraisal is the add on appraisal and pricing tool within the CRM. The tool includes the ability to access wholesale book data to help the dealer calculate trade in and wholesale pricing and retail pricing.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Integrates seamlessly with your processes and software so you can manage the customer journey efficiently.Anticipate and adjust to vehicle market changes with pricing rule assignments and data syndication
Provide an easier way to manage inventory across dealerships or groups with customizable views and sorting capabilities.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.CDK DESCRIPTION: Elead Inv Mgmt Appraisal / LL / VMD
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead inventory management bundle is a complete bundle of the Inventory appraisal and pricing tool, the Lot Launch syndication management tool and Vehicle Market Data that includes retail market supply and demand data. All data is accessed within the ELEAD CRM.
A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:
Integrates seamlessly with your processes and software so you can manage the customer journey efficiently.
Anticipate and adjust to vehicle market changes with pricing rule assignments and data syndication.
Provide an easier way to manage inventory across dealerships or groups with customizable views and sorting capabilities.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Description: Elead lot launch syndication is an add on tool to the CRM to control vehicle data exports to 3rd parties for syndication.

Integrates seamlessly with your processes and software so you can manage the customer journey efficiently.
 anticipate and adjust to vehicle market changes with pricing rule assignments and data syndication.

A LA CARTE SOFTWARE.Value Prop:

Free up staff

TCPA-compliant opt-in and opt-out

SERVICE.Description: Elead service lane is the desktop and app for customer greeting and walk-around in the service lane. Sold to NON-CDK DMS dealers only. Be sure to include the proper 3rd party DMS integration catalog number. US only.

Elead service shop is a software tool to digitally manage service workflow in the service drive. Sold to NON-CDK DMS dealers only. Be sure to include the proper 3rd party DMS integration catalog number. US Only.

Elead service scheduler is an online customer service scheduling portal (customer facing) and internal scheduling dashboard for dealership use to schedule appointments. Sold to NON-CDK DMS dealers only. Be sure to include the proper 3rd party DMS integration catalog number. US only.

CALL CENTER.CDK DESCRIPTION: AutoPilot Calls - PNB
CALL CENTER.Description: AutoPilot calls are outbound phone calls to prospects identified with the AutoPilot software to drive return service business. Dealership must have AutoPilot software that is included with Plus bundle.
CALL CENTER.Dealer Hurts:
Sales and BDC staffing/turnover
 Slow service lane traffic
 Low revenue per RO
CALL CENTER.Value Prop:
Only owned and operated automotive specific all call center
High trained automotive BDC professionals
